TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResolveNonMSBuildProjectOutput extends Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveProjectBase

summary.span: Determina os arquivos de saída para referências de projeto não MSBuild.

span.span: Determines the output files for non-MSBuild project references.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O `ResolveNonMSBuildProjectOutput` tarefa procura por uma propriedade especial definida pelo [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] IDE para a lista de GUIDs de projeto e suas saídas associadas.The `ResolveNonMSBuildProjectOutput` task searches for a special property set by the [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] IDE for the list of project GUIDs and their associated outputs. O IDE somente previamente resolve não[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projetos e dessa forma separa [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projeto referências de não -[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] referências.The IDE only pre-resolves non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projects and in this way separates [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project references from non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] references. O IDE retorna a lista de [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projetos como UnresolvedProjectReferences.The IDE returns the list of [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projects as UnresolvedProjectReferences. Isso permite que a tarefa usar mais forte [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] mecanismos para manipular apenas o [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] referências de projeto, como.This enables the task to use more powerful [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] mechanisms to manipulate just the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project references, such as. a chamada para destinos específicos de referências para obter o nome do arquivo de manifesto, que não seria possível com uma lista mista de [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] e não-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] referências de projeto.calling into specific targets of references to get the manifest file name, which would not be possible with a mixed list of [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] and non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project references.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PreresolvedProjectOutputs { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: Obtém ou define uma cadeia de caracteres XML que contém saídas de projeto resolvidas.

span.span: Gets or sets an XML string containing resolved project outputs.

value.span: Uma cadeia de caracteres XML que contém resolvido saídas do projeto.

span.span: An XML string containing resolved project outputs.

summary.span: Obtém ou define caminhos de referência resolvidos que preservam os atributos de referência do projeto original.

span.span: Gets or sets resolved reference paths that preserve the original project reference attributes.

value.span: Os caminhos de referência resolvido preservam os atributos de referência de projeto original.

span.span: The resolved reference paths that preserve the original project reference attributes.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ UnresolvedProjectReferences { cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ value); };

summary.span: Obtém ou define os itens de referência de projeto que estão no formato [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)].

span.span: Gets or sets project reference items that are in the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] format.

value.span: Itens de referência que constam de projeto a [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] formato.

span.span: Project reference items that are in the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Como [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] somente pré-resolve não[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projetos, os itens de referência de projeto que não puderam ser resolvidos usando a lista previamente resolvida saídas estão no [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] formato.Since [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] only pre-resolves non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projects, the project reference items that could not be resolved using the pre-resolved list of outputs are in the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] format.
